::Ramulus/Striker::

Ramulus spins around as he hears a voice behind him, watching the scene with 
narrowed eyes.

His eyes widen as he hears Brix's instructions, sighing and nodding his head. 
The whole thing was crazy, but he could see Brix's position in this.

"Allright," Ramulus says, picking up Fliq and running into the shuttle. He 
places the Maximal on a chair, strapping him in. Tapping a few keys on the 
console to get the shuttle ready for liftoff, activating the autopilot system 
to fly back to the CF in five minutes, Ramulus runs back outside.

"I'm not gonna let you fight this alone," he says, his gun ready as he comes 
up to Brix, "We've got 5 minutes to get this over with, or the shuttle leaves 
without us."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker's eyes widen as he sees Savage suddenly go for Spears.

"Watch out!" he yells, continuing to fire on Savage. He growls as he moves 
quickly flying toward Savage, the sudden movement sending a spasm of pain up 
him. He hadn't realized that the bot's fireball would do so much damage.
